column1: Juanjuí Airport (Spanish: Aeropuerto de Juanjuí) (IATA: JJI
column2: ICAO: SPJI) is an airport serving Juanjuí
column3: a city on the Huallaga River in the San Martín Region of Peru. The airport is owned and operated by CORPAC S.A.

column1: The Juanjui non-directional beacon (Ident: UAN) is located just southeast of the runway.
